page.title: 02HOUSING 1
page.content:
{ HOUSING}
In our allocated area there are five estates,these are:(a){Seaton Carew (b){Rossmere Ward}(c){Rift House Ward (d){Owton Ward}(e){Fens Ward Each has it's own type of housing. {Housing Styles At Seaton Carew The houses were built around the {1960's}with average sized front and back gardens.Some have bay windows.The majority of the houses have a garage. Every house has a bath and running hot and cold water.Most of the houses have central heating.The average sized house has three bedrooms.Some houses have had extention bedrooms built.The houses are mainly semi-detatched although there are a few detatched.
